about_the_game:
The authorities of Graffiti Paradise have been booted out, and the graffiti utopia has opened its doors to street artists from all walks of life from all over the world - including YOU!

Explore your creative potential in this demo of Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise!



🧑‍🎨 A 100% paintable environment!
🙆‍♀️ Quirky, colourful friends to meet and interact with!
🏙️ A diverse range of environments to influence your creativity!
📸 Photo mode with a range of filters to frame your work!
🎺 Licensed soundtrack by independent artists!
detailed_description:
The authorities of Graffiti Paradise have been booted out, and the graffiti utopia has opened its doors to street artists from all walks of life from all over the world - including YOU!

name: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-9050
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Welcome To the demo of Graffiti Paradise! Explore for hidden secrets, meet interesting friends, unlock painting tools, and fill your world with colour!
